de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.server.persistence.service
Class PersistenceService

java.lang.Object
  de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.server.persistence.service.PersistenceService
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContinentService, CountryService, NeighbourService, PlayerService, WorldService
public abstract class PersistenceService
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class that hold the used persistence engine and defines methods, that every persistence handler should implement.

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Id: PersistenceService.java 663 2010-07-04 16:24:05Z andre.koenig $

switchPersistenceEngine

public static void switchPersistenceEngine()
Possibility to switch the persistence engine. We determine the current persistence engine and switch to file based or database storage. CAUTION: To avoid data loss use this method chary!
